alert.note: Alert for Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:41PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT EAST CENTRAL HUMBOLDT AND WEST CENTRAL TRINITY COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM PDT... At 440 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hyampom, or 13 miles west of Hayfork, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Willow Creek, Hayfork, Burnt Ranch, Del Loma, and Hyampom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Interior; Northern Trinity; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Trinity
